DOC.brief_title: Metal Metal Versus Ceramic Metal Hip Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , multi-center , randomize , single blind , control clinical investigation compare safety efficacy cementless Ceramic Metal total hip prostheses versus cementless Metal Metal total hip prosthesis .
